hero.description: Expert workmanship, advanced diagnostics, and a commitment to safety. We provide dealership-quality service at local prices.

features.title: Fully Insured
features.text: Comprehensive insurance coverage for total peace of mind while your car is with us.

features.title: Expert Diagnostics
features.text: State-of-the-art computer diagnostic systems to identify issues accurately.

features.title: Free Collection
features.text: Complimentary vehicle collection and return service from your home or work.

intro.title: High Standard of Workmanship is Our Priority
intro.description: JM Motors mechanics are highly trained in Car Servicing. We use only the latest technology for our diagnostic systems and recommended parts to ensure safety and reliability.

cta.title: Ready to book?
cta.text: Don't wait until it's too late. Secure your Pre-NCT check or service today with Maynooth's most reliable mechanics.

about.title: About JM Motors
about.subtitle: Reliable • Experienced • Local
about.heading: Your Local Mechanic Since 2004
about.p1: John Mills has been a mechanic for over 20 years, operating as an independent mechanic for the last 11 years. What started as a passion for engines has grown into Maynooth's most trusted independent garage.
about.p2: At JM Motors, we believe that a high standard of workmanship is the top priority. We have built a reputation in Maynooth and Kildare for honesty, reliability, and technical expertise. We don't just fix cars; we build relationships with our customers based on trust.
about.p3: We use only the latest technology for our diagnostic systems and only recommended parts to ensure safety and peace of mind. Whether you drive a compact car, a commercial van, or a 4x4, we treat every vehicle with the same level of meticulous care as if it were our own.

services.headerText: JM Motors provides a full range of car repairs and servicing. We pride ourselves on using only recommended parts and the latest technology.

items.title: Full Car Servicing
items.description: Comprehensive interim and full servicing for all makes and models to maintain manufacturer warranties and keep your vehicle running smoothly.

items.title: Pre-NCT / DOE Checks
items.description: Rigorous multi-point inspection to prepare your vehicle for the National Car Test, identifying failure points before you go.

items.title: Computer Diagnostics
items.description: Using dealer-level diagnostic software to identify fault codes, engine warning lights, and complex electrical system errors.

items.title: Brakes & Clutches
items.description: Expert replacement and repair of brake pads, discs, calipers, and complete clutch kits including flywheels.

items.title: Exhausts & Emissions
items.description: Exhaust system repair, DPF cleaning, and emission testing to meet environmental standards and pass NCT.

items.title: Batteries & Electrics
items.description: Battery health checks, alternator testing, and replacements with high-quality, long-lasting units.

items.title: Timing Belts
items.description: Critical engine maintenance. Precision replacement of timing belts and water pumps to prevent catastrophic engine failure.

items.title: Wheel Alignment
items.description: 3D laser wheel alignment and balancing to prevent uneven tyre wear, save fuel, and improve handling safety.

items.title: Warning Light Reset
items.description: Resetting service indicators, ABS, ESP, and Airbag lights after professional repair and verification.

items.title: Crash Repairs
items.description: Professional bodywork repairs and panel beating to restore your vehicle to factory condition after a collision.

items.title: All Makes & Models
items.description: We have the tooling and technical data to service cars, vans, and 4x4s of all major manufacturers.

services.collectionText: We offer a free collection and return service from your home or workplace within our local area. Let us take the hassle out of your car maintenance.

testimonials.name: Mick Stone
testimonials.content: I’ve always trusted John with my pride and joy. His service is unrivalled. The attention to detail is something you just don't find at the big dealerships anymore.

testimonials.name: Mary B.
testimonials.content: Thanks for getting me back on the road John, I’d be lost without you! The collection service from Intel was a lifesaver.

testimonials.name: Tom Williams
testimonials.content: We had an unlucky collision in the bad icy conditions over Christmas. JM Motors had us right in 3 days, and the bill wasn’t half as bad as I thought it would be! Top class.

testimonials.name: Darren Mooney
testimonials.content: We left our van in with JM Motors to be repaired and they dealt with the insurance company directly, it really cut down the hassle involved. Highly recommended for commercial work.

testimonials.name: Sarah C.
testimonials.content: Passed my NCT first time after a pre-check here. They spotted a suspension issue that would have failed me. Honest and reliable.
